Text: I'm...sleepy.
Why not take a nap then?
Won't be able...to fish...

But the weather's so nice and cozy. Letting your mind
wander and dozing off is all part of fishing.
If I was gonna sleep, I should've...stayed home...
Yeah, you've got a point.
...I'll sleep...
Sweet dreams.
Zzz...
...She looks so adorable when she's asleep.

The calm breeze makes me feel so relaxed. It's like
reality is slipping away.
Enjoy it. Today's supposed to be that kind of day.

Unfortunately, I haven't come up with a single good
idea or inspiration.

Ideas are like fish—something will catch on sooner or
later.
You sure that's how it works?

You've caught quite a lot for a beginner, Gamma. You
might even be more talented at fishing than walking.
Don't be mean, Zeta.
Well then, guess I'll start preparing—
Preparing what? Will you use that fryer you brought?

Yeah. I'm getting hungry. This was sort of meant to be
today's main objective anyway.
Anything I can do to help—

You helping will just result in more work. Besides,
you're about to get a hit on your fishing line.
You can't treat people like that—
Wh-Whoa! I got a hit! It's a big one!
You've been saying the same thing for every fish.

...Well, let's see. So far, we've caught tuna, sea
bream, and squid.

We'll use the squid as bait to catch larger tuna.
Which means, first up is...the tuna. Let's deep-
fry it to a crisp.
Something...smells good.

This aroma—it's not just the tuna she's frying.
What else is she up to?

That should do for the toast. Now to put the
deep-fried tuna and sauce in between—
What's that, Zeta?
Mm... It's a tuna sandwich.
A "tuna sandwich"? Never heard of a sandwich before.

Master taught me how to make it. I mean, it's not
unusual to stuff fish between bread, but this sauce
makes it a little different.
Master Shadow's Shadow Wisdom? Can I taste it?
Of course. Hold on. I'll make one for Eta as well.
Alright, here goes.
N-No way...
Wh-Whoaaaaa!
Oh?
It's deeeelicious!!!

Fresh tuna fillet deep-fried in a thin, crisp layer
of batter! Bread toasted to a rich golden brown
yet creamy on the inside! Who knew these two
textures could taste so exquisite together!
When did you become a food journalist?
What is this rich yet refreshing sauce?

It's like the "mayonnaise" Master Shadow once showed
us...but it has a distinctly sweet and sour flavor.

It's "tartar sauce." Master taught me how to make it
as well. It's got chopped pickles and a little lemon
juice mixed in.

Incredible how that transforms the flavor completely—
it's wisdom upon wisdom!

The acidity creates a harmoniously divine melody
between the fried tuna and the bread!
You're starting to sound like Epsilon...

Yes... Yes, this is it! This is a huge business
opportunity for the Garden!

We won't fish tuna...we'll process it and sell it!
Instead of baiting tuna, we'll use the tuna as
bait to grow our war chest!

Ohh... I, Gamma, have unraveled...Master Shadow's
true intentions!
Oh, you're unraveling, that's for sure...
But yeah, these sandwiches certainly are tasty.
...Something...smells good...
Wanna try one?
...Yeah...
...Yummy...

Agreed.  A simple tuna fish sandwich can be very
tempting indeed.
